title: example-component
description: A starter component with examples for implementation of OIH actions.

upsert.title: Upsert Object by ID
upsert.description: Create or Update the selected object

objectType.label: Object Type
objectType.prompt: Please select the type of object to upsert

lookupObject.title: Lookup Object by ID
lookupObject.description: Lookup an object (at most 1) by ID

objectType.label: Object Type
objectType.prompt: Please select the type of object to look up

allowIdToBeOmitted.label: Allow ID to be omitted
allowIdToBeOmitted.note: If selected, the ID field is not required

allowZeroResults.label: Allow zero results
allowZeroResults.note: If selected, when zero objects are found the empty object will be emitted instead of an error

waitForObjectToExist.label: Wait for object to exist
waitForObjectToExist.note: If selected, when no results are found apply rebounds and wait until object exists

linkedObjectsToPopulate.label: Linked Objects to populate
linkedObjectsToPopulate.note: Select which parent or child objects to include in result
